sentences.sentence: You don't influence the people around of you, but you can remodel whom circumambient of you.
sentences.translation: 您不会影响周围的人，但是您可以重塑周围的人。

sentences.sentence: You don't influence the people around of you , but you can remodel whom circumambient of you.
sentences.translation: 你无法改变你周围的人，但可以改变你所围绕的人。
